markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Snagging Hook Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3384)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=646" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=809" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=715" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 300 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 180 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This snare snags a creature with its wicked metal hooks. The first creature to enter the square takes 5d8 piercing damage and 5d8 slashing damage, with a DC 29 [basic](/Actions.aspx?ID=2765) Reflex save. On a critical failure, the hooks piercing its flesh make the creature immobilized until it successfully [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=2296) (DC 29).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Snagging Hook Snare
